item.title: 开始使用此博客
item.description: 介绍 这是一个由ox-hugo + hugo搭建起来的简易博客。用Emacs中的org mode写作，使用ox-hugo将org文件转换为markd

item.title: OpenMP学习笔记
item.description: 注：此文原为notion上发布 Syntax parallel regions 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 #pragma omp parallel { // your code } #pragma omp parallel num_threads(int) // specify thread number #pragma omp master // only executed by the master thread #pragma omp single // only executed once synchronization 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9

item.title: “我时常感到生活在大海上……”
item.description: 注：此文原为notion上发布 J’ai toujours eu l’impression de vivre en haute mer, menacé, au cœur d’un bonheur royal. —Albert Camus L’Été 翻

item.title: Love Minus Zero & Streets of London
item.description: 注：此文原为notion上发布 Love Muis Zero 歌词（部分摘录） In the dime stores and bus stations People talk of situations Read books, repeat quotations Draw conclusions on the wall Some speak of the future My love she speaks softly She knows there’s no success like failure And that failure’s no success at all
